alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 9:46PM EDT until May 11 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Berrien County in south central Georgia... Southern Tift County in south central Georgia... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 945 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Omega, or 7 miles south of Tifton, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tifton, Enigma, Omega, Phillipsburg, Unionville, Vanceville, Tift Airport, Hillsdale, Eldorado, Fender and Brookfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
